Description: Sherd of black-glazed pottery vessel; wholly glazed; incised inscription on outside. Probably from neck of a closed vase.
Curator's comments: The clay of the piece does not seem Attic. The shape may be an oenochoe or a large kantharos.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2023)
